thread.title: Ground News - Man accused of attack near Longmont now charged with first-degree murder after victim dies
thread.title_full: Ground News - Man accused of attack near Longmont now charged with first-degree murder after victim dies

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Man accused of attack near Longmont now charged with first-degree murder after victim dies
text:
Summary by Ground News Michael Lucky, 32, is now charged with first-degree murder. The victim has been identified as 60-year-old Steven Craig. Lucky had two ongoing cases that began in December at the time of the incident. He is currently in custody on a $1 million cash-only bond. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Longmont Times-Call Lean Left High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Prairie Mountain Publishing Man accused of attack near Longmont now charged with first-degree murder after victim dies A man accused of attacking another man with an ax in a home near Longmont on Dec. 19 had his charges upgraded following the death of the victim on Sunday. Michael Lucky, 32, is now charged with first-degree murder, first-degree burglary, two counts of felony stalking and three violations of a protection order, according to a charging document filed with on Monday. Lucky is also facing two sentence enhancements. Michael Joseph Lucky (Boulder Coun…
